meanings.definition: Last name of Vinton Cerf, an American Internet pioneer, recognized as one of "the fathers of the Internet".
meanings.english_definition: The surname of Vinton Cerf, an American Internet pioneer, recognized as one of "the fathers of the Internet".

examples.sentence: Vinton Cerf is known for his contributions to the TCP/IP protocol.
examples.translation: ヴィントン・サーフは、TCP/IPプロトコルへの貢献で知られています。

etymology.value: The name Cerf is of French origin, meaning "stag" or "deer."
